column4: hi guys I need help to follow the FAQ instructions to enable UTF-8 in Amarok here http://amarok.kde.org/wiki/FAQ#Amarok_is_not_displaying_my_utf-8_id3v2_tags_properly.21
I don't know what to do with the perl script...
and to run it on huge directories, find /dir/to/root/dir -type f -exec perl /path/to/script {} \;
